title: Ep. 616 The Most Disturbing Article Ive Read This Year
description:
This is the most disturbing article I’ve read in a long time about the destructive effects of liberalism on the citizens of inner cities.
http://www.americanthinker.com/blog/2017/12/heres_the_proof_democrat_policies_fail.html
 
Yes, if you are middle class, it is highly likely that you are getting a substantial tax cut. This handy chart should help. 
http://click.heritage.org/u6r000TH5e0s0q03lQIMTX0

 
A great piece about Trump’s response when one of his judicial nominees was scuttled.
http://www.washingtonexaminer.com/the-unlikely-opportunity-matthew-petersen-gave-trump/article/2643859
 
Economic optimism is exploding.
https://www.cnbc.com/2017/12/18/economic-optimism-soaring-helping-trump-cnbc-survey.html
 
The truth about the Obamacare mandate repeal is driving Democrats mad. 
http://dailysignal.com/2017/12/18/who-wouldnt-have-coverage-if-the-obamacare-mandate-is-repealed/
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

This is the most disturbing article I’ve read in a long time about the destructive effects of liberalism on the citizens of inner cities. http://www.americanthinker.com/blog/2017/12/heres_the_proof_democrat_policies_fail.html   Yes, if you are middle class, it is highly likely that you are getting a substantial tax cut. This handy chart should help.  http://click.heritage.org/u6r000TH5e0s0q03lQIMTX0   A great piece about Trump’s response when one of his judicial nominees was scuttled. http://www.washingtonexaminer.com/the-unlikely-opportunity-matthew-petersen-gave-trump/article/2643859   Economic optimism is exploding. https://www.cnbc.com/2017/12/18/economic-optimism-soaring-helping-trump-cnbc-survey.html   The truth about the Obamacare mandate repeal is driving Democrats mad.  http://dailysignal.com/2017/12/18/who-wouldnt-have-coverage-if-the-obamacare-mandate-is-repealed/
